channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- distribution/distribution
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- distribution/distribution

item.title: CVE-2023-2253|2023-06-29T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- distribution%2Fdistribution
item.description: A flaw was found in the `/v2/_catalog` endpoint in distribution/distribution, which accepts a parameter to control the maximum number of records returned (query string: `n`). This vulnerability allows a malicious user to submit an unreasonably large value for `n,` causing the allocation of a massive string array, possibly causing a denial of service through excessive use of memory.
